com.epam.myGame.model.heroes.abstractHero

Class Hero

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.epam.myGame.model.heroes.abstractHero.Hero
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Heal, Health, Mana, Race
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Archer, Warrior, Wizard

    public abstract class Hero
extends java.lang.Object
implements Race, Heal, Health, Mana
    The abstract class Hero. This class contains data about hero.
